name: Aegean Voyage
overview: Your mission is to find as many treasures as possible by clever maneuvers (sometimes by storm) to various bays / islands. Even the smallest collision with a rocky pixel costs a life. Once there, you get a clue and have to decide if you want to search the island or not. If you make the right decision, you will find a treasure. Otherwise, your ship will be sunk by a monster or god of antiquity. The game ends when all treasures are found or all ships are sunk.
